text: Berlin Opera may refer to: * Staatsoper Unter den Linden (State Opera Unter den Linden), opened in 1742 as Königliche Hofoper (Royal Court Opera) * Deutsche Oper Berlin (German Opera Berlin), opened in 1912 as Deutsches Opernhaus (German Opera House) * Komische Oper Berlin (Comical Opera Berlin), opened in 1892 as Theater Unter den Linden * Berlin Opera Academy (Comical Opera Berlin), opened in 2015 in collaboration with Opernfest * Berlin International Opera, founded in 2006
title: Berlin Opera
